Objective_Title: Achieve Integrated Domain Awareness & Interdiction Superiority
LOE_Title: Build a Unified, Persistent, Multinational Domain Awareness Architecture
OAI_Description: Establish physical and virtual Hemispheric Fusion Centers (HFCs) at WHEMCOM HQ, JIATF-S, and key partner locations to create a shared COP.
Land: Stand up land-focused cells fusing HUMINT, border, and ground threat reporting.
Sea: Integrate JIATF-S, USCG, partner navies, and coastal radar into the fusion centers.
Air: Fuse P-8, MQ-9, AEW, and partner air tracks into a common air picture.
Cyber: Connect national and partner cyber threat feeds to the COP.
Space: Integrate space-based ISR, commercial imagery, and satellite AIS/SAR feeds.
Decisive_Point_1_Label: HFC IOC – Shared COP Online for Caribbean/Venezuela
Decisive_Point_2_Label: HFC FOC – COP Used Routinely for Targeting & DSCA

Objective_Title: Achieve Integrated Domain Awareness & Interdiction Superiority
LOE_Title: Build a Unified, Persistent, Multinational Domain Awareness Architecture
OAI_Description: Develop common data formats, interfaces, and sharing protocols (“PARD-X”) for all partners feeding and using the COP.
Land: Standardize land threat and incident reporting formats.
Sea: Standardize maritime track, boarding, and interdiction data formats.
Air: Standardize air track, flight plan, and intercept data feeds.
Cyber: Define cyber IOC formats, STIX/TAXII or equivalent for partners.
Space: Define metadata and formats for space/commercial imagery ingestion.
Decision_Point_2_Label: Partner Agreement on Minimum Common Standard
Decisive_Point_1_Label: First Multinational PARD-X-Compliant COP Segment Operational
Decisive_Point_2_Label: PARD-X Adopted by All Core Partners

Objective_Title: Achieve Integrated Domain Awareness & Interdiction Superiority
LOE_Title: Build a Unified, Persistent, Multinational Domain Awareness Architecture
IMO_Title: Integrate Unmanned Systems Across the Hemisphere
OAI_Description: Procure and field long-range unmanned ISR systems (e.g., MQ-9, Triton, partner UAS) oriented on key hemispheric approaches and Venezuelan arcs.
Land: Establish land-based launch, recovery, and maintenance hubs.
Sea: Deploy maritime-focused UAS or cue naval assets via UAS tracks.
Air: Align airspace coordination and deconfliction for persistent UAS orbits.
Cyber: Link UAS sensors and metadata into cyber-secure networks.
Space: Task space-based sensors to complement UAS coverage and handoff.
Decision_Point_2_Label: Initial UAS Packages Fielded to WHEMCOM/Partners
Decisive_Point_1_Label: Persistent UAS Coverage of Key Maritime/Border Corridors

Objective_Title: Achieve Integrated Domain Awareness & Interdiction Superiority
LOE_Title: Build a Unified, Persistent, Multinational Domain Awareness Architecture
IMO_Title: Integrate Unmanned Systems Across the Hemisphere
OAI_Description: Establish a Combined Task Force for unmanned systems (CTF-UAS) to coordinate multinational UAS employment, training, and TTP development.
Land: Provide land-based staff, planners, and training lanes for UAS operations.
Sea: Coordinate maritime UAS patrol lanes and handoffs with partner navies.
Air: Synchronize airspace use, deconfliction, and air tasking for UAS.
Cyber: Integrate cyber defense and C2 for UAS networks.
Space: Coordinate cross-cueing between UAS and space-based sensors.
Decisive_Point_1_Label: First Fully Multinational CTF-UAS Patrol Executed

Objective_Title: Achieve Integrated Domain Awareness & Interdiction Superiority
LOE_Title: Build a Unified, Persistent, Multinational Domain Awareness Architecture
IMO_Title: Establish Real-Time Intelligence Sharing Protocols & Authorities
OAI_Description: Create standing tear lines, real-time sharing protocols, and authorities for detect-to-interdict intelligence dissemination to partners.
Land: Define land and law-enforcement tear lines and caveats.
Sea: Define maritime tactical sharing procedures for interdiction forces.
Air: Define air defense and air-policing sharing rules.
Cyber: Define cyber threat intel flows and real-time sharing triggers.
Space: Define rules for release of space/commercial imagery at various classifications.
Decision_Point_2_Label: Partner Agreement on Real-Time Sharing Thresholds
Decisive_Point_1_Label: Real-Time Sharing Protocols Used in Live Interdictions

Objective_Title: Achieve Integrated Domain Awareness & Interdiction Superiority
LOE_Title: Achieve Superior, Coordinated, Multinational Interdiction Effects
OAI_Description: Establish a standing JICB with interagency and partner liaisons to synchronize interdiction priorities, targeting, and operations.
Land: Provide land targeting, law-enforcement, and DSCA representation.
Sea: Coordinate maritime patrol patterns and boarding priorities.
Air: Align air ISR and strike/intercept priorities.
Cyber: Integrate cyber target development and deconfliction.
Space: Include space/MDA and commercial imagery in targeting deliberations.
Decisive_Point_2_Label: JICB Becomes Default Mechanism for All Major Interdiction Efforts

Objective_Title: Achieve Integrated Domain Awareness & Interdiction Superiority
LOE_Title: Achieve Superior, Coordinated, Multinational Interdiction Effects
OAI_Description: Develop and wargame multinational interdiction playbooks based on specific ISR triggers and legal/partner caveats.
Land: Rehearse land arrests, seizures, and DSCA implications.
Sea: Rehearse maritime boardings, diversions, and escalation control.
Air: Rehearse air intercept, diversion, and denial scenarios.
Cyber: Rehearse cyber disruption of logistics, finance, and C2.
Space: Incorporate space-based MDA and ISR triggers into playbooks.
Decisive_Point_1_Label: Playbooks Employed in Live, Limited Interdictions

Objective_Title: Achieve Integrated Domain Awareness & Interdiction Superiority
LOE_Title: Achieve Superior, Coordinated, Multinational Interdiction Effects
OAI_Description: Conduct synchronized, multinational surge interdiction operations (“HEMISPHERE SPRINT”) based on COP/ISR triggers, focused on Venezuelan-linked flows.
Land: Deploy land-based law-enforcement and partner units to exploit seizures.
Sea: Concentrate USCG/USN/partner ships and cutters along key arcs.
Air: Surge MPA, ISR aircraft, and tanker support for sustained ops.
Cyber: Execute planned cyber actions to disrupt network adaptation.
Space: Use space AIS/SAR and imagery heavily to cue and evaluate surge effects.
Decision_Point_1_Label: Partner Commitment to High-Tempo Surge Confirmed
Decisive_Point_1_Label: Full HEMISPHERE SPRINT Conducted with Multinational Participation
Decisive_Point_2_Label: Surge Becomes Repeatable Tool with Predictable Strategic Effects

Objective_Title: Achieve Integrated Domain Awareness & Interdiction Superiority
LOE_Title: Achieve Superior, Coordinated, Multinational Interdiction Effects
OAI_Description: Create a dedicated Red Team/analysis cell to anticipate and model Venezuelan/state/TCO adaptation to WHEMCOM activity.
Land: Model land routes, staging, and overland evasion patterns.
Sea: Model maritime re-routing, vessel spoofing, and use of flags of convenience.
Air: Model air route changes, use of small aircraft, and non-traditional airfields.
Cyber: Model cyber workarounds, new crypto channels, and disinformation TTPs.
Space: Model space-related deception (AIS spoofing, RF masking).
Decisive_Point_1_Label: Red Team Products Integrated into Targeting & Planning

Objective_Title: Achieve Integrated Domain Awareness & Interdiction Superiority
LOE_Title: Achieve Superior, Coordinated, Multinational Interdiction Effects
OAI_Description: Create a rapid TTP development cell within the JICB to turn lessons (successes/failures) into updated practices for all partners.
Land: Feed land TTP changes to partner military/police forces.
Sea: Update maritime boarding/interdiction TTPs and share with navies/coast guards.
Air: Update air intercept and DSCA support procedures.
Cyber: Update cyber defense and offensive playbooks.
Space: Update employment of space/COP for detection and interdiction.
Decision_Point_2_Label: Partners Adopting New TTPs in Exercises
Decisive_Point_1_Label: TTP Cell Drives Noticeable Improvement in Interdiction Outcomes
